summary: Alan is a musician who leaves a busted-up band for New York, and a new musical voyage. He tries to stay focused and fends off all manner of distractions, including the attraction to his good friend's girlfriend.
cast: Justin Rice|Rachel Clift|Andrew Bujalski|Seung-Min Lee|Pamela Corkey|Kevin Micka|Ralph Tyler|Peter Pentz|Bill Morrison|Tamara Luzeckyj|Mary Varn|Kate Dollenmayer|Keith Gessen|Salvatore Botti|Damian Hess
title: Mutual Appreciation
